proposal:
idea_implementation: Create or update the file generated_7.js with this complete content:

#### Revenue Capture Mechanism Design & Implementation (Day 18) ####
This phase would include finalizing the integration with Stripe, setting up necessary configurations within Railway's platform-specific settings if needed and ensuring that all components are set to capture revenue accurately. This setup includes configuring endpoints for handling charge captures or processing payments through invoices where appropriate (`/api/v1/billing` etc.), implementing business rules around when charges should be captured, integrating with Stripe's API as per requirements provided above (not fully detailed here due to scope limitations).

This is for opportunity: Automation Strategy Consulting
Make sure the file is complete, working, and production-ready.
risks: Slow failure: unnoticed degradation accumulating by 2027-12-31
Unintended consequence: incentives shift toward short-term metrics, long-term reliability decays
Incentive drift: stakeholders habituate to optimistic outputs, raising risk of silent defects
mitigations: Add scheduled adversarial audits with hard pass/fail gates
Track leading indicators for drift and trust inflation; alert on trend change
Prefer reversible rollouts; keep rollback artifacts warm and tested
